response.overview: A kinky husband (Parker Savage) has an irresistible fantasy of watching his sexy tattooed wife (Eden Ivy) as she’s sexually aroused by a stranger (Zayne). Parker can’t get the idea out-of-his-head so he confides in his wife. Eden loves her husband dearly and will do anything to make him happy. So, she decides to give him a real show! Parker chooses a massage parlor as the perfect setting to make his fantasy come true. Its three erotic cuckold tales of oily hands-on passion that’s sure to arouse…
response.title: My Wife's Massage 3
